def_cn: （通常因寒冷或恐惧而）蜷缩，缩成一团
def_en: If you huddle somewhere, you sit, stand, or lie there holding your arms and legs close to your body, usually because you are cold or frightened.

def_cn: （通常因寒冷或恐惧而）聚在一起，挤成一团
def_en: If people huddle together or huddle round something, they stand, sit, or lie close to each other, usually because they all feel cold or frightened.
If people huddle in a group, they gather together to discuss something quietly or secretly.

def_cn: 拥挤的一群;杂乱的一堆
def_en: A huddle is a small group of people or things that are standing very close together or lying on top of each other, usually in a disorganized way.
